# Overview of Registers

The study period in Register RELOC-AGE ranges from 1990-2020 and is comprised of 13 registers with staggered coverage which is here illustrated.  Below the figure are descriptions of each register contained in the study.


```{r,out.width="100%"}

knitr::include_graphics(here("output/figures", "registers_timeline.png"))
```

```{r}

register_tbl <- readRDS( here("output/tables", "register_tbl.rds") )

 kable(register_tbl,
      "html",
      caption = "Register descriptions",
      linesep = "",
      booktabs = TRUE,
      align = "ll",
      escape=FALSE) %>% 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c( "responsive"), font_size = 11) %>%
    scroll_box(width = "800px", height = "500px")


```
